channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-9413] WebUI says ".META." table but table got renames to "hbase:meta". Meed to update the UI.
item.description:
In the UI, we say "The .META. table holds references to all User Table
regions" but the table name is "hbase:meta" and not ".META." We need to update this.
item.summary: WebUI says ".META." table but table got renames to "hbase:meta". Meed to update the UI.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Blanket replace of .META. Fixes the JMS issue at least.
Marking critical. Its polish.

-   * TableName for old .META. table. Used in testing.

+   * TableName for old hbase:meta table. Used in testing.



- * - creates system namespace directory and move .META. table there

- * renaming .META. table to hbase:meta,

+ * - creates system namespace directory and move hbase:meta table there

-        LOG.info("Got an old META edit, continuing with new format ");

+        LOG.info("Got an old hbase:meta edit, continuing with new format ");

Since we intend to run HFileV1Detector on 0.94 installations, we don't need this change below:
+ .getCurrentTableInfoStatus(fs, path, false) != null) || path.toString().endsWith("hbase:meta");

Same goes with ZKDataMigrator:
+ if (table.equals("ROOT") || table.equals("hbase:meta")) {
